CLIENTNUM.description: Unique identifier for the customer holding the credit card

Attrition_Flag.description: Internal event (customer activity) variable - if the account is closed then 1 else 0

Customer_Age.description: Demographic variable - Age of the customer

Education_Level.description: Education Level e.g. high school, college graduate, etc.

value_dict.High School: Customer has a high school level education
value_dict.Graduate: Customer has a graduate level education
value_dict.Unknown: Education level of the customer is unknown
value_dict.College: Customer has a college level education
value_dict.Post-Graduate: Customer has a post-graduate level education
value_dict.Doctorate: Customer has a doctorate level education

value_dict.Unknown: Marital status of the customer is unknown

Income_Category.description: Income Category of the account holder (in dollars)

value_dict.Unknown: Income of the customer is unknown

Card_Category.description: Product Variable - Type of Card (Blue, Silver, Gold, Platinum)

Total_Relationship_Count.description: Total no. of products held by the customer

Months_Inactive_12_mon.description: No. of months inactive in the last 12 months

Contacts_Count_12_mon.description: No. of Contacts in the last 12 months

Credit_Limit.description: Credit Limit on the Credit Card

Total_Revolving_Bal.description: Total Revolving Balance on the Credit Card

Avg_Open_To_Buy.description: Open to Buy Credit Line (Average of last 12 months)

Total_Amt_Chng_Q4_Q1.description: Change in Transaction Amount (Q4 over Q1)

Total_Ct_Chng_Q4_Q1.description: Change in Transaction Count (Q4 over Q1)

Naive_Bayes_Classifier_Attrition_Flag_Ca.description: Naive Bayes classifier prediction probability for attrition flag, card category, contacts count, dependent count, education level, months inactive in the last 12 months - class 1
Naive Bayes classifier prediction probability for attrition flag, card category, contacts count, dependent count, education level, months inactive in the last 12 months - class 2

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit card customer behavior analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict whether the customer will close the account.
prompt.answer_prompt: The account is still active[0] or The account is closed[1]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit card transaction analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the total transaction amount.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted total transaction amount?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit card transaction analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the total transaction count.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted total transaction count?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit card usage analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the change in transaction count from Q4 to Q1.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted change in transaction count from Q4 to Q1?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in credit card usage analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the average utilization ratio.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted average utilization ratio?
